Package net.viktorc.pp4j.impl

Class JavaProcessManager<T extends Runnable & Serializable>

  • Object
    • AbstractProcessManager
      • SimpleProcessManager
        • JavaProcessManager<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - A type variable implementing the Runnable and Serializable interfaces that defines the base class of the startup task.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProcessManager, Resettable
    public class JavaProcessManager<T extends Runnable & Serializable>
extends SimpleProcessManager
    A sub-class of AbstractProcessManager for the management of process instances of the JavaProcess class.
    Author:
    Viktor Csomor

        The message the Java application launcher outputs if it fails (due to illegal arguments).
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • JavaProcessManager

        public JavaProcessManager​(ProcessBuilder builder,
                          T initTask,
                          T wrapUpTask,
                          Long keepAliveTime)
        Constructs a JavaProcessManager instance using the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        builder - The ProcessBuilder to use for starting the Java processes.
        initTask - The task to execute in each process on startup, before the process starts accepting submissions. If it is null, no taks are executed on startup.
        wrapUpTask - The task to execute in each process before it is terminated. If it is null, no wrap-up task is executed.
        keepAliveTime - The number of milliseconds of idleness after which the processes should be terminated. If it is null, the life-cycle of processes will not be limited based on idleness.
